definition: lit. an arrogant army is bound to lose (idiom)/fig. pride goes before a fall
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.chinese: 聖經箴言16:18裏寫道“驕兵必敗”。

sentences.english: He almost always walks to work.
sentences.chinese: 他幾乎總是走驕兵必敗。

sentences.english: The teacher told us pride comes before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 老師告訴我們驕兵必敗。

sentences.english: Don't be proud, because pride goes before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要驕傲，因爲驕兵必敗。
